price: ហើយរាល់អ្វីៗទាំងអស់ យើងបានបង្កើតឱ្យមានជាគូៗ ដើម្បីពួកអ្នកនឹកឃើញ(ពីអានុភាពរបស់អល់ឡោះ)។
arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wamin kulli shayin khalaqnā zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
